oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Crazy Water Crystals Program #08
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Crazy Water Crystals program #08, sponsored by the Crazy Water Crystal company. Hosted by Bill Karn (name unconfirmed), with the Crazy Radio Gang, the Milo Twins, the Boys In Buckskin (including Elmer and Jake), Martha Jordan (real name Dorothy Martha), Ritchie, and Sammy.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Crazy Radio Gang; Martha Jordan; Milo Twins; Boys In Buckskin
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (Bill Karn) -- Bill Karn and Ritchie talk -- Jesse James (Ritchie fiddle) -- Crazy Water Crystals commercial (Bill Karn) -- Bill Karn introduces the Boys In Buckskin -- Song Of The Pioneers (Boys In Buckskin) -- Crazy Water Crystals commercial (Bill Karn) -- Bill Karn introduces the Milo Twins -- When The Saints Go Marching In (Milo Twins) -- Crazy Water Crystals offer (Bill Karn) -- Bill Karn introduces Martha Jordan -- When It's Harvest Time, Sweet Angeline (Martha Jordan) -- Bill Karn and Sammy talk -- Closing statement (Bill Karn) -- Theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Milo Twins; Milo, Edwin, 1916-1965; Milo, Edward, 1916-1978; Boys In Buckskin (Musical group)
